welcome_message_body: Welcome to Birmingham, a vibrant city known for its rich history, stunning architecture, and lively cultural scene. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring all that this charming city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Donut Bar + Coffee
restaurants.description: Donut Bar + Coffee is a donut shop located in Southfield.

restaurants.description: Einstein Bros Bagels is a bagel shop located in Southfield.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Birmingham Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Birmingham Airport primarily serves low-cost airlines and charter flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Birmingham Airport serves mainly international and long-haul flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
